forecast.day_comments: A 50 percent chance of rain.  Widespread dense fog, mainly between 1am and 2am.  Otherwise, mostly cloudy, with a low around 37. West northwest wind around 11 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.
forecast.night_comments: A chance of rain before 2pm, then a slight chance of rain after 4pm.  Partly sunny, with a high near 41. West wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 30%.
